nodes.text: Allehander Pso was a male individual who owned Pso's Palace on the Five Points space station in the Five Points system. He had downy, finger-long, brown and green feathers on his balding head that trailed down his back and underneath his clothing, as well as taloned-fingers and jade-green teeth that were pointed and jagged like the edge of a saw blade. He caught Jyn Erso when she made fake credits to pay the debt of the Imperial colonel Lucka Solange. He found in Erso the chance to make some great business with her talent.
